title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: I am trying to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace, but the keybinding manager seems to think it is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word instead. When I try to reassign the key via the key preference page, it displays Ctrl+Del when I press Ctrl+Backspace. I am using a Swiss German Keyboard with Swiss German Locale.
OB: Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word, but it is currently behaving as Ctrl+Del and deleting the next word.
EB: Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.
SR: The keybinding manager should recognize Ctrl+Backspace as a separate key combination and allow me to assign a command to it.
